content.p: Our tutors have more information about studying through distance learning. If you are considering studying on a pre-sessional course online, our tutors have more information about the courses and specifically studying through distance learning. Students taking an online course will not need to travel to the UK. See course dates and fees for course dates and details. The courses will include a mix of: Catherine talks about what you can expect from an online course. Our tutors and some of our students who have studied online have also filmed short videos about their experience.
